content.description: Face moves will get you up to the jams and laybacks available as the crack narrows on the left. chimney moves available up top.
content.protection: Full set of nuts for the bottom, and then a large cam for the top, has a two bolt anchors.
content.location: Left most route in the Romper Room.

content.description: Nice  a few moves up the bottom blocks bring you to the business - a double-crack dihedral with some obvious features for non-jammed feet. Jams are good, though. Stemming back to the roof renders a comfy 5.7 variation.
content.protection: Nuts and Cams to 3", lots of anchor options, bring long runners
content.location: Dihedral opposite Simply Red in the Romper Room (way right)

content.description: Take the middle of the Romper Room up through a narrowing chimney and out to Simply Red anchors. There is a bolt hidden in the chimney which might keep you from decking. *Please be mindful of a bird's nest in the chimney and do not disturb*
content.protection: Takes all sorts of gear down low. Some larger stuff is good out of the chimney.

content.description: Start on the large block and climb the face but no back stemming allowed!!!! just pure face moves
content.protection: This is a top rope route - although route has been led using the chimney
content.location: This route is found just to the right of Mild and Wild

content.description: Climb the overhanging on the corner block across from Simply Red.  Move up into the chimney and clip the bolt on Kingfisher.
content.protection: Gear for crack, quickdraw, two bolt anchor.

content.description: This is the spot when it is hot.  You can always find shade as this is basically a cave.  Great rock with some intereting and unique routes for the area.
